firestore.reasoning: The data structure is updated to support efficient and secure querying for the results dashboard. A root `quiz_attempts` collection is added. When a user takes a quiz, the attempt is written to this root collection. This allows a quiz creator to query this single collection (e.g., `where('authorId', '==', currentUserId)`) to fetch all results for all quizzes they have created. This avoids inefficient and complex client-side fan-out queries. The user-specific attempt history is still stored under `/users/{userId}/quiz_attempts` for their private viewing. Security rules are updated to manage access to this new root collection.
